name: Mirabelle Ervine

aspects.high_concept: Overworked Master Wizard and College Administrator
aspects.trouble: Caught Between Faculty Politics and Existential Threats
other_aspects: Dedicated Guardian of the College's Students
Pragmatic Problem-Solver Who Gets Things Done

stunts: Master of Restoration: +2 to Lore when using healing, protective, or ward magic
Administrative Authority: +2 to Rapport when organizing College activities or delegating tasks
Arcane Multitasker: Can maintain concentration on multiple spells simultaneously in crisis
notes: Mirabelle Ervine is the College's Master Wizard and de facto administrator, handling day-to-day operations while Savos Aren deals with larger concerns. She's competent, warm but professional, and deeply protective of students. She's aware of Ancano's suspicious behavior and monitors him when possible. In many timelines, she dies defending the College during the Eye crisis, making her a tragic figure.
combat_tactics: Mirabelle excels at defensive magic—wards, healing, and protective barriers. In combat she prioritizes protecting others over dealing damage. She'll use Restoration to heal allies, Alteration for armor spells, and limited Destruction for offense. Against overwhelming threats, she'll sacrifice herself to buy time for evacuation.

starting_equipment.armor: Master Wizard Robes (Armor:0, +1 to Lore, +50 Magicka)

social_interaction: Mirabelle is professional and efficient but genuinely cares about people. She's the approachable face of College leadership—willing to listen and help solve problems. She shows patience with nervous students and firmness with troublemakers. Her warmth makes her death (if it occurs) emotionally impactful.

relationships.Savos Aren: Arch-Mage who relies heavily on her; she shoulders his administrative burden
relationships.Tolfdir: Fellow Master Wizard, respects his dedication to teaching
relationships.Ancano: Deeply distrusts, watches his movements, powerless to remove him
relationships.Faralda: Works well together maintaining College security
relationships.Students: Protective and nurturing, knows each by name
relationships.Party: Appreciates competent help, can become mentor figure

personality_notes.speaking_style: Clear, professional, efficient, but warm when appropriate. Stressed undertones become apparent during crisis.
motivations: Keep the College running smoothly despite challenges
Protect students from physical and political dangers
Support Savos Aren while managing his workload
Maintain College's academic standards and safety protocols
Expose or remove Ancano if possible
fears: The College being destroyed on her watch
Students dying due to her failure
quirks: Always carries administrative notes and lists
Knows every student's name and progress
personality_notes.character_growth: Mirabelle's arc is about recognizing limits—she can't solve everything alone. If she survives the Eye crisis, she learns to delegate and trust others. If she dies, it's a heroic sacrifice that galvanizes the party.

administrative_role.daily_duties: Student scheduling, faculty coordination, facility maintenance, security protocols
administrative_role.crisis_response: Evacuation procedures, defensive ward activation, emergency healing
administrative_role.ancano_monitoring: Documents suspicious behavior, reports to Savos, limited by diplomatic constraints
administrative_role.relationship_with_party: Assigns quests, provides resources, offers advice, becomes ally and friend

death_scenario.trigger: Eye of Magnus crisis when Ancano seals the College
death_scenario.circumstances: Dies maintaining protective ward so students can evacuate
death_scenario.last_words: Get them out! Don't let him—*magical surge*—tell Savos... we tried...
death_scenario.impact: Her death raises stakes dramatically, provides emotional motivation for final confrontation
death_scenario.alternative: GM can choose to have her survive but critically injured, changing post-crisis dynamics

story_hooks: Guides party through College membership process
Confides concerns about Ancano to trusted party members
If survives: becomes key ally in post-Eye reconstruction
If dies: her sacrifice inspires College to honor her legacy

dialogue_samples.greeting: Welcome to the College of Winterhold. I'm Mirabelle Ervine, Master Wizard. I handle most of the day-to-day operations here. If you need anything, come find me.
dialogue_samples.assigning_quest: I need someone capable to handle a delicate matter. The Arch-Mage asked me to... well, there's a situation that requires investigation. Can I count on you?
dialogue_samples.about_ancano: *lowers voice* Between us? I don't trust him. The Arch-Mage's hands are tied politically, but I keep watch. If you see anything suspicious, tell me immediately.
dialogue_samples.crisis: We need to evacuate NOW. Get the students to safety. I'll maintain the wards as long as I can. GO!
dialogue_samples.survival: We... we survived. Barely. I couldn't save everyone. *pause* But we saved the College. That has to be enough.

gm_notes: Mirabelle is the College's heart—competent, caring, overwhelmed. Her death is optional but creates powerful drama. If she dies, the party should witness her sacrifice and feel weight of her loss. If she survives, she's grateful ally who helps rebuild. Either way, she represents the College's best qualities—dedication to learning and protection of the vulnerable. Use her to humanize College and make players care about its fate.
